data.message: Dear all, i need to get a verification badge for a very important page. please help

replies.message: Hi Samir! You can learn more about the process for verifying Pages here: http://bit.ly/2xZoxf2. Please keep in mind that not all Pages are currently eligible for verification. Thanks! -Caitlin

I understand this issue, but the link says that verification is not available in the meantime. What do I have to do to explain why I need the badge for my page and the Page's content. The page I am trying to verify is an official page in my country. Please Advise.
